author: joshjung
message: Reverting shoot to spacebar button. Also updating chat window so that when typing, all control is relinquished from phaser over keyboard. After 1 second of no typing control is given back to the game.

author: joshjung
message: Making chat history scroll and making it jump to bottom when new stuff is added.

author: joshjung
message: Adding health bar and autofocus on login and pressing enter to start the game.

author: joshjung
message: Bumping minframe time to 0.3 instead of 0.2.

message: Graceful transitoin of client out of broken socket state.

author: joshjung
message: Super large style changes and addition of chat system.
